description:
Cool game design with option to have different theme active for night mode. 
Highlighting the number makes it a lot easier to play. Working smooth.

I'm trying to play on a 16:9 monitor, and I can't get the controls to show up on screen using any available resolution. The window cannot be resized and is unplayable on my screen. I gave two stars because the color options and the ability to add pencil notes are great features, but I am unable to play.

unusable.
window can't be resized, controls are off screen

Tengo esta app en el celular y me encanta, es súper estética, en especial porque no me agradó el sudoku que venía por defecto, sin embargo al correrla, el tamaño no es ajustable y no puedo seleccionar los números
